name: Triple EMA Alignment
description: Three EMA alignment for strong trend confirmation
rationale: When fast EMA > medium EMA > slow EMA, we have alignment across three timeframes - this indicates a strong, sustained trend rather than a temporary bounce. The 9/21/55 combination covers short-term (9), medium-term (21), and intermediate (55) trends. Entry when fast crosses above medium ensures we catch the trend early. Exit when fast crosses below medium catches trend reversals. This multi-timeframe confirmation reduces false signals compared to single EMA crossovers. Works best on trending stocks like tech leaders.
